item.title: KringleCon 3 - Holiday Hack Challenge 2020
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Here’s my writeup for the 2020 SANS Holiday Hack challenge: ‘Zat You, Santa Claus? featuring KringleCon 3: French Hens. This year, the event has moved to Santa’s newly renovated castle at the North Pole! The goal is to solve the 11 objectives (well, 12 since the last objective has two parts) and save Christmas, of course. Along the way, terminals and mini-challenges can provide hints if you help the elf fix his troubles.
